schema.description: Input schema for creating a new card

bodyText.description: Body text of the new card (Optional). Leave empty to keep the current body.

anyOf.description: Whether the card should be archived (Optional). Enter "open", "archived" (without quotes), or leave empty to keep the previous status.
Whether the card should be marked as complete (Optional). Enter "complete", "incomplete" (without quotes), or leave empty to keep the previous status.

membersToAdd.description: Members to add to the card (Optional). This should be a list of member IDs. Leave empty to keep the current members.

membersToRemove.description: Members to remove from the card (Optional). This should be a list of member IDs. Leave empty to keep the current members.

labelsToAdd.description: Labels to add to the card (Optional). This should be a list of label IDs. Leave empty to keep the current labels.

labelsToRemove.description: Labels to remove from the card (Optional). This should be a list of label IDs. Leave empty to keep the current labels.

anyOf.description: The due date of the card in ISO 8601 format (Optional). Leave empty to keep the current due date.

schema.description: Output schema for updating a card
